channel.title: Optimization on Suresh Kumar Gadi
channel.description: Recent content in Optimization on Suresh Kumar Gadi

item.title: Participation in SACS-2017
item.description: Suresh Kumar Gadi gave a plenary talk on real-time computing and conducted a workshop on Solving mathematical equations with the help of genetic algorithms at the 1st Symposium on Applied Computer Science (SACS-2017).
